scripts.docker:dev: composer dump-autoload && docker-compose up && echo 'Server started at http://localhost:8080'
scripts.docker:restart: docker-compose restart && echo 'Server restarted at http://localhost:8080'
scripts.docker:build: composer dump-autoload -o && docker-compose up --build && echo 'Docker image rebuilt and server started at http://localhost:8080'
scripts.docker:clean: docker system prune -af && echo 'The Docker system has been cleaned'
scripts.dev: composer dump-autoload && concurrently "npm run docker:dev" "npm run vite:dev"
scripts.build: composer dump-autoload -o && vite build && docker-compose build
scripts.kill: docker-compose down; docker stop $(docker ps -aq) || true; kill-port 4173 5173 8080 9000 || true
